net.philsprojects.net
Interface ServerFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
TcpServerFactory, TcpServerFactory, UdpServerFactory, UdpServerFactory
public interface ServerFactory

A factory which creates a server handled by the given accepter, which uses the given selector and pipeline, and has binded to the given address.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Method Summary
 Server newServer(Selector selector, Pipeline pipeline, Acceptor acceptor, java.net.SocketAddress address)
          Creates a new Server.
 

Method Detail

newServer

Server newServer(Selector selector,
                 Pipeline pipeline,
                 Acceptor acceptor,
                 java.net.SocketAddress address)
Creates a new Server.

Parameters:
selector - The selector which can create workers for connecting clients.
pipeline - The pipeline the server and its clients should use.
address - The address the server is bounded to.
Returns:
A newly instantiated server with the given parameters.
